channel.title: Need some PI commands
channel.description:
i was looking for PI commands and can found command ::veng or ::barrage the thing is when u say ::veng you get lunar book and veng runes or ::barrage then ancient magic and barrage runes , it is possible to do for PI base? If it can some one make it?
the commands would be for
1 - Moderator 2 - Administration 3 - Owner 4 - Hoster 5 - Donator

item.title: Need some PI commands

item.description:
@nieksas wrote:

done , ty for help u can lock topic now ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Need some PI commands
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

[quote=“nieksas, post:14, topic:368958”]he he fixed it :PPP but how to make that command for only , mod rights 1 admins rights 2 owner rights 3 hoster rights 4 and donator rights 5?

there is command

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("veng")) {
	c.setSidebarInterface(6, 16640);
	c.getItems().addItem(557, 1000);
	c.getItems().addItem(9075, 400);
	c.getItems().addItem(560, 200);
	}[/quote]

For that use it like…

	if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("veng") && c.playerRights == 1) {
		c.setSidebarInterface(6, 16640);
		c.getItems().addItem(557, 1000);
		c.getItems().addItem(9075, 400);
		c.getItems().addItem(560, 200);
		}

Just change the playerRights value 1 to whatever you wanna…

Read full topic

item.title: Need some PI commands
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

nieksas:

ohh so no one have working command? i just need with lunar spell book with spawned runes and yes in my server there are lunar spell book and donator rights are 5 so anyone can help me out with fully working command?

Off topic…but it isnt good to put donator rights 5. If you copied a command from somewhere for mod + donator will get access to those commands unless you use “==” instead of “>”. Just warning

On topic, for lunar spellbook to appear you can use this command:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("lunar")) {
c.setSidebarInterface(6, 29999);
c.getItems().addItem(item_id, amount);
c.getItems().addItem(item_id, amount);
c.getItems().addItem(item_id, amount);
}

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need some PI commands
item.dc:creator: @Mariokillu Mariokillu
item.description:
@Mariokillu wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Mariokillu link=topic=465090.msg3401334#msg3401334 date=1289949955]

I’ve never used PI, so I’ll do a version with variables I know, I’m sure if you’ve used PI you’ll be familiar with the variables it uses.

if (command.startsWith("barrage") && playerRights > 0) {
addItem(ID, amount);
// carry on. This adds runes
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855) // sets to ancient magicks tab
}

I’ve never used PI, so just change variables. I’m sure you can do the same for the other.
If someone with PI knowledge could post, it’d be great.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMAND") && playerRights >= 0) { c.getItems().addItem(ITEM ID, AMOUNT); c.sendMessage("You Spawned ADDHERE Runes!"); }

fixed
[/quote]
That’s not fixed completely.
Using the playerRights variable, you need to construct the client, so it can append to all players.
Such as, c.playerRights. Though, since you have it set to greater than, or equal to, zero, which means anyone, we don’t really need to include it, now do we?

if(playerCommand.equals("COMMAND_NAME")) { c.getItems().addItem(ITEM, AMOUNT); c.sendMessage("You spawn some items."); }[/quote]

lol

Read full topic
